headline:
Press Release: Creative Realities, Inc.
and Reflect Win Multi-Million Dollar

Retail Project on First Bid Together
content:
Creative Realities, Inc. and Reflect Win
Multi-Million Dollar Retail Project on First Bid
Together

Merged company making waves with strongest
digital signage offerings on market

PR Newswire
LOUISVILLE, Ky. and DALLAS, Feb. 1, 2022

LOUISVILLE, Ky. and DALLAS, Feb. 1, 2022 /
PRNewswire/ -- Digital signage leaders Creative
Realities, Inc. ("CRI", NASDAQ: CREX, CREXW)
and Reflect Systems, Inc. announced today that
their first joint sales effort has resulted in a major
win -- a project to deploy digital experiences

for a retail customer at hundreds of locations
nationwide for an expected total contract value in
excess of $10 million.

The large-scale project comes shortly after CRI
and Reflect announced in November their plans
